resources.string:
About:
This app was created for the sole purpose of educating people about Breast Cancer.

 Instructions:
Just tap on any category that interests you and the app will do all the work for you.

 Features:
	Info: Facts, Treatments
	News: Articles about Breast Cancer
	Testimonies: Compilation of stories of people with
	Breast Cancer Experience

 Support Information:
	GoPink! is developed by ZLG.
	zion_chan@dlsu.edu.ph
	laureen_garcia@dlsu.edu.ph
	glenn_comendador@dlsu.edu.ph 

Sources:
1. http://www.breastcancer.org/treatment 
2. http://www.icanservefoundation.org 
3. http://www.pbcn.org 
4. https://rojosonmedicalclinic.wordpress.com

In cooperation with:

 De La Salle Universitys
 CHED Philippine Higher Education Research Network-
 (PHERNet) Sustainability Studies Program
 Intelligent Systems Laboratory,

 De La Salle University
